colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 651

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second West Pakistan Highway Project
            will finance the foreign exchange cost of the construction
            of two highways via Sheikhupura - between Lahore and
            Lyallpur and Lahore and Sargodha respectively - including a
            major bridge across the Chenab River; feasibility and
            detailed design studies for other roads; a transport
            coordination study; a three-year maintenance program; and
            consultant services.
